item.title: LEIDEN API v0.0.1.4
item.description:
Product: LEIDEN API v0.0.1.4
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 02 Feb 2026 21:51:40 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Tools used by LevyLab to interact with Leiden Cryostats

Front Panel (FP) API:
- pushButton({Start, 3He, 4He, Normal, Recovery, Auto, Reset, LED Test})
- setMode({Auto Off, Start, Condense 3He, Condense 4He, Normal Circulation, Recovery})
- getMode()

Temperature Control (TC) API:
- getTemperature()
- setTemperature()
- setHeater()
- getHeater()

Release Notes: [0.0.1]
#14 change configuration file location
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data-PGSQL v3.11.0.13
item.description:
Product: LV-Data-PGSQL v3.11.0.13
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 02 Feb 2026 14:27:06 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Database management and Selects and Insert macros to PostgreSQL/timescaleDB.


Release Notes: [3.11.0]
#128 Validate connection befroe executing SQL queries (and invalidate/reconnect)
- Store top level caller name in connections.ini
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: D2XX-LV v1.4.0.9
item.description:
Product: D2XX-LV v1.4.0.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Sat, 10 Jan 2026 09:28:47 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin / LevyLab

Description: This library provides an interface to FTDI's D2XX drivers, designed to align more closely with LabVIEW programming conventions.

Release Notes: Issue #7
- improved list devices when multiple devices are present but some are already open

item.title: Cryostation v1.4.0.9
item.description:
Product: Cryostation v1.4.0.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 16 Dec 2025 23:00:58 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Program for logging Montana Instruments Cryostation status to the SQL DB. Provides a UI and API for getting information from the Cryostation.

#7 add method getTemperatureTarget

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.11.0.26
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.11.0.26
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 15 Dec 2025 23:07:16 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: [1.11.0]
#35 add methods getTemperatureTarget and getMagnetTarget
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
